banner.title: Minimal English -
banner.content: Minimal English is a specialized IELTS class designed to help students achieve their goals in the IELTS exam through a minimalist and effective learning approach. We combine Hybrid Learning methods with differentiated and personalized teaching approaches, ensuring that each student receives maximum attention and support.

about_us.label: ABOUT MINIMAL ENGLISH
about_us.content: With the Hybrid Learning method, combining both in-person and online learning, we provide students with a friendly environment and a minimalist yet effective learning approach. At Minimal English, students not only gain knowledge but also build confidence and motivation to grow in their own ways. We are committed to delivering the highest teaching quality, helping students achieve their learning goals and overcome all challenges.

info_classes.name: Class: Mầm (Sprout)
info_classes.description: The Mầm class at Minimal English is for students with an entry level of 4.0+. The goal of the class is to consolidate and improve basic English skills. Students will be comprehensively trained in Listening, Reading, Speaking, and Writing skills, helping to build a solid foundation for further development at higher levels.

info_classes.name: Class: Rễ (Root)
info_classes.description: The Rễ class is designed for students with an entry level of 5.0+. This class focuses on enhancing intermediate English skills and preparing for the IELTS exam. Students will be guided on effective test-taking strategies, developing linguistic thinking skills, and improving Listening, Reading, Speaking, and Writing skills comprehensively.

info_classes.name: Class: Thân (Trunk)
info_classes.description: The Thân class is for students with an entry level of 6.0+. The goal of the class is to develop advanced English skills and thoroughly prepare for the IELTS exam. Students will learn test-taking strategies, improve language skills, and boost their confidence in using English at a higher level.

why_us.label: WHY CHOOSE MINIMAL ENGLISH
why_us.title: Benefits of Studying at Minimal English

info_why_us.title: Minimalist Learning Method:
info_why_us.content: Minimal English applies the Hybrid Learning method, combining in-person and online learning, allowing students to access knowledge flexibly and optimize their study time.

info_why_us.title: Professional Instructors:
info_why_us.content: The teaching staff, academic staff, and teaching assistants at Minimal English all have IELTS scores of 7.5+, with the founder and main instructor scoring 8.0 IELTS. The instructors hold certifications and have years of teaching experience, ensuring the highest teaching quality.

info_why_us.title: Maximum Support for Students:
info_why_us.content: Minimal English offers free retakes within 3 months for students who do not achieve their target scores.

info_why_us.title: Flexible Tuition Policies:
info_why_us.content: The center provides flexible tuition packages and attractive promotions, making it accessible for all students to join the courses.

info_why_us.title: Friendly Learning Environment:
info_why_us.content: Minimal English creates a friendly and supportive learning environment, helping students feel comfortable and confident during their studies.

info_why_us.title: Advanced Technology:
info_why_us.content: The center applies automatic scoring technology and an online learning system, enabling students to self-assess and improve their skills effectively.

info_why_us.title: Comprehensive Support:
info_why_us.content: Minimal English provides post-class learning support, including homework, supplementary materials, and assistance from instructors and academic staff.

mission.label: Mission
mission.content: Minimal English strives to offer English courses that are easy to understand, simple, and effective. We focus on minimalist thinking in both our teaching methods and the content delivered, helping students grasp knowledge more easily and quickly. Our experienced and dedicated teaching staff are always ready to support and accompany students on their journey to mastering English. We aim to help students improve their English proficiency and achieve higher educational and career goals.

vision.label: Vision
vision.content: At Minimal English, our goal is to become a reputable language training institution, offering high-quality English education at an affordable cost. We believe that through education, students can expand their learning and career opportunities, laying a solid foundation for the future. We aspire to be a place where every student can develop themselves comprehensively and sustainably.

brand_story.label: Brand Story
brand_story.description: Ms. Hằng Nga, the founder of Minimal English, is a living example of how perseverance and passion can lead to remarkable success. Her story is an inspiring journey of overcoming challenges and relentless effort to build a better future.

detail_stories.content: A challenging marriage brought many obstacles to Ms. Hằng Nga. At the age of 27, she started over with a passion for education. Starting with an IELTS score of only 3-4.0, she persevered in self-study, gradually increasing her score to 6.5, continuing to strive for 7.5, and eventually achieving 8.0 IELTS.

During nearly four years as an academic supervisor at an English center, Ms. Hằng Nga gained valuable experience. She authored a book for the Vietnam National University Publishing House, which was widely published and distributed. During this time, she continued her studies, earning a Master's degree in TESOL from Victoria University – Melbourne, Australia, at the end of 2018.

Ms. Hằng Nga started teaching classes at home, aiming to create an accessible learning experience, helping people approach IELTS more easily and simply. Beginning with only a few students, thanks to the trust of parents, the number of students gradually increased.

Ms. Hằng Nga always believes that 'Thanks to education, my life has changed dramatically, and I want to help others improve their lives through education as I did.' Since 2020, over 50 students have achieved their aim of 6.5-7.5. Minimal English aspires to help 300 students achieve a score of 6.5 or higher within the next five years, becoming a friendly learning environment with a dedicated and diligent team.

highlights.label: Highlight
highlights.description: Minimal English is not just an English class but a symbol of perseverance and the spirit of not giving up. It is also a place where Ms. Hằng Nga imparts values of consistency, minimalism, and effectiveness in learning.
